title: Lenses - quantities to determine focal length

content.question: An object is placed near a converging lens. Which of the following data could be used to calculate the focal length of the lens?

choices.label: The distance from the lens to the object and the height and orientation of the image
The distance from the lens to the object and the magnification and orientation of the image
The distance from the lens to the image and the height and orientation of the image
The magnification, height, and orientation of the image

content.answer: The distance from the lens to the object and the magnification and orientation of the image
